rules_text:
Exile target creature, then roll a d6.
[b]1-4 | [/b]Return it under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
[b]5-6 [/b]| Return it under its owner's control at the beginning of the next upkeep.
flavor_text:
[i]“Who needs Al? I'll take a chance on myself.”
—Eve Inn, the Paradoxical[/i]
notes: Exile target creature. Then roll a d6. If the result is even, return it at the beginning of the next end step. If the result is odd, return it at the beginning of your next upkeep.
